Queries.Query: select to_char( sysdate, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDateFrom from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-1, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-2, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-3, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-4, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-5, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-6, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-7, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual

select to_char( sysdate, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDateTo from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-1, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-2, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-3, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-4, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-5, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-6, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-7, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual
select 1 ParamShiftFrom from dual union all select 2 from dual
select 1 ParamShiftTo from dual union all select 2 from dual
select 'Записи за период '|| to_char(:ParamDateFrom,'dd.mm.yyyy')||' ' ||:ParamShiftFrom||' смены по '|| to_char(:ParamDateTo,'dd.mm.yyyy')||' '|| :ParamShiftTo||' смену' title from dual;

select 1 as KOL ,'Самосвалы' as TYPE_TABLE ,MESCOUNTER as EVENTCOUNTER ,VEHID as ID ,TIME ,GMTTIME ,X ,Y ,WEIGHT ,FUEL ,SPEED ,INCLINATION ,HEALTHSTATUS --,TIMESYSTEM ,EVENTTYPE ,VEHTYPE ,VEHCODE ,MESNUMBER ,MOTOHOURS ,EVENTGROUP ,EVENTCODE ,EVENTDESCR
from DISPATCHER.EVENTSTATEARCHIVE
where (:ParamType = 'Самосвалы' or :ParamType = 'Вся техника') and TIME between dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeFrom('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftFrom, :ParamDateFrom) and dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeTo('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo)
union all
select 1 as KOL ,'Бульдозеры' as TYPE_TABLE ,EVENTCOUNTER ,AUXID as ID ,TIME ,GMTTIME ,X ,Y ,0 WEIGHT ,FUEL ,SPEED ,INCLINATION ,0 HEALTHSTATUS --,'' TIMESYSTEM ,EVENTTYPE ,'' VEHTYPE ,0 VEHCODE ,0 MESNUMBER ,0 MOTOHOURS ,0 EVENTGROUP ,0 EVENTCODE ,'' EVENTDESCR
from DISPATCHER.AUXEVENTARCHIVE
where (:ParamType = 'Бульдозеры' or :ParamType = 'Вся техника') and TIME between dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeFrom('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftFrom, :ParamDateFrom) and dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeTo('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo)
union all
select 1 as KOL ,'Экскаваторы' as TYPE_TABLE ,EVENTCOUNTER ,SHOVID as ID ,TIME ,GMTTIME ,X ,Y ,0 WEIGHT ,FUEL ,SPEED ,0 INCLINATION ,0 HEALTHSTATUS --,'' TIMESYSTEM ,EVENTTYPE ,'' VEHTYPE ,0 VEHCODE ,0 MESNUMBER ,0 MOTOHOURS ,0 EVENTGROUP ,0 EVENTCODE ,'' EVENTDESCR
from DISPATCHER.SHOVEVENTSTATEARCHIVE
where (:ParamType = 'Экскаваторы' or :ParamType = 'Вся техника') and TIME between dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeFrom('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftFrom, :ParamDateFrom) and dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeTo('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo)
order by TIME desc
